workflow.title: Provenance Challenge 1 workflow -- mockup version
workflow.description: simulates the image processing for the PC1 workflow using beanshell that simply track test stringsan image is a pair (header, image) specified as a list of depth 1: [header,image]so each processor with image input takes an input list.Note that the processors are designed to operate on single images (except softmean that operates on a list of images), but because the initial input is a list of images, all are processed by implicit iteration.
